control.name: ceGroupHint
control.description: If checked, group hints are displayed.

control.name: ceLinkHint
control.description: If checked, group hints are displayed.

control.name: seInterval
control.description: Specifies the time interval after the mouse pointer stops over an element (link, group) and before its hint is displayed.

control.name: ceCustomHint
control.description: If checked, custom hints are displayed for navbar groups and links. For this purpose, the GetHint event is handled.
